Pre-Game Insights: India bounced back strongly from an early setback in the first T20I, ensuring that they level the series at 1-1.
Zimbabwe will have to bat exceptionally well against a formidable Indian bowling attack, to push for another win in the series.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The average first innings score of 157 runs could prove to be defendable, especially if the early morning moisture stays intact on the playing surface.
Others: The Zimbabwe batting lineup has been a big let down in the first two T20I matches of the series except for Brian Bennett.
India batting lineup put up a massive score in the second T20I with a maiden international hundred for Abhishek Sharma
